languages.text: Вашим людям не составило труда обезвредить местных — никто особо и не противился судьбе. Изнуренные и уставшие от самой жизни, они печально наблюдали, как богатства, механизмы и пожитки, скопленные несколькими поколениями их предков, грузят на шаттлы и отправляют высоко в серое небо за хмурые тучи. Не осталось ничего, что помогло бы этим людям выжить. Впрочем, кого волнуют чужие несчастья.

traits.locale_text: Вашим людям не составило труда обезвредить местных — никто особо и не противился судьбе. Изнуренные и уставшие от самой жизни, они печально наблюдали, как богатства, механизмы и пожитки, скопленные несколькими поколениями их предков, грузят на шаттлы и отправляют высоко в серое небо за хмурые тучи. Не осталось ничего, что помогло бы этим людям выжить. Впрочем, кого волнуют чужие несчастья.

languages.text: Your people had little difficulty subduing the locals — nobody had the strength to resist. Gaunt and exhausted by their miserable lot, they dolefully watched on as the invaders carried away the wealth, machines, and possessions laboriously scrounged together by generations of their ancestors. The shuttles, glutted with their society's toil, soared high above the oppressive clouds, far out of reach. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about other people's misery.
languages.original_text: Вашим людям не составило труда обезвредить местных — никто особо и не противился судьбе. Изнуренные и уставшие от самой жизни, они печально наблюдали, как богатства, механизмы и пожитки, скопленные несколькими поколениями их предков, грузят на шаттлы и отправляют высоко в серое небо за хмурые тучи. Не осталось ничего, что помогло бы этим людям выжить. Впрочем, кого волнуют чужие несчастья.

traits.locale_text: Your people had little difficulty subduing the locals — nobody had the strength to resist their fate. Gaunt and exhausted by their miserable lot, they sadly watched the invaders carry the wealth, machines and possessions scrounged by generations of their ancestors into the shuttles that soared high above the oppressive clouds. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about the other people's misery.

There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about the other people's misery.

The shuttles, glutted with their society's toil, soared high above the oppressive clouds, far out of reach. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about other people's misery.

Your people had little difficulty subduing the locals — nobody had the strength to resist. Gaunt and exhausted by their miserable lot, they dolefully watched on as the invaders carried away the wealth, machines, and possessions laboriously scrounged together by generations of their ancestors. The shuttles, glutted with their society's toil, soared high above the oppressive clouds, far out of reach. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about other people's misery.

languages.text: 你的船员不费吹灰之力就制服了当地人。这些人没有任何力量抵抗，他们早已被悲惨的命运折磨得憔悴不堪，只能满心悲伤，眼睁睁地侵略者抢走他们祖祖辈辈辛苦积攒起来的财富、机器与财物。满载他们辛劳成果的穿梭机高翔在令人压抑的云层上，遥不可及，一去不返。再也没有任何东西能帮助他们混下去了，可谁又会在乎别人的苦难呢？
languages.original_text: Your people had little difficulty subduing the locals — nobody had the strength to resist. Gaunt and exhausted by their miserable lot, they dolefully watched on as the invaders carried away the wealth, machines, and possessions laboriously scrounged together by generations of their ancestors. The shuttles, glutted with their society's toil, soared high above the oppressive clouds, far out of reach. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about other people's misery.

traits.locale_text: 你的船员不费吹灰之力就制服了当地人。这些人没有任何力量抵抗，他们早已被悲惨的命运折磨得憔悴不堪，只能满心悲伤，眼睁睁地侵略者抢走他们祖祖辈辈辛苦积攒起来的财富、机器与财物。满载他们辛劳成果的穿梭机高翔在令人压抑的云层上，遥不可及，一去不返。再也没有任何东西能帮助他们混下去了，可谁又会在乎别人的苦难呢？

languages.text: 現地の者たちを制圧するのには、ほとんど苦労しなかった。誰一人として抵抗できる力を持つ者がいなかったのだ。先祖代々苦労してかき集めてきた富や機械、財産が侵略者によって持ち去られるのを、みじめな境遇に疲れ果てた彼らは悲しげに見守っていた。社会の労苦を腹いっぱい飲み込んだシャトルは、重苦しい雲の上、はるか遠くまで舞い上がった。彼らが生き残るために必要なものは何ひとつ残されていなかったが、いったい誰が他人の苦しみなど気にかけると言うのか。
languages.original_text: Your people had little difficulty subduing the locals — nobody had the strength to resist. Gaunt and exhausted by their miserable lot, they dolefully watched on as the invaders carried away the wealth, machines, and possessions laboriously scrounged together by generations of their ancestors. The shuttles, glutted with their society's toil, soared high above the oppressive clouds, far out of reach. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about other people's misery.

traits.locale_text: 現地の者たちを制圧するのには、ほとんど苦労しなかった。誰一人として抵抗できる力を持つ者がいなかったのだ。先祖代々苦労してかき集めてきた富や機械、財産が侵略者によって持ち去られるのを、みじめな境遇に疲れ果てた彼らは悲しげに見守っていた。社会の労苦を腹いっぱい飲み込んだシャトルは、重苦しい雲の上、はるか遠くまで舞い上がった。彼らが生き残るために必要なものは何ひとつ残されていなかったが、いったい誰が他人の苦しみなど気にかけると言うのか。

languages.text: Tu gente no tuvo muchas dificultades para someter a los lugareños, pues nadie tenía fuerzas para resistirse. Demacrados y exhaustos por su miserable situación, observaron con tristeza cómo los invasores se llevaban su riqueza, las máquinas y las posesiones que generaciones de sus antepasados habían reunido con tanto esfuerzo. Las lanzaderas, llenas del trabajo de su sociedad, se elevaban por encima de las opresivas nubes, lejos de su alcance. No les quedaba nada para sobrevivir, pero a quién le importa la miseria de los demás.
languages.original_text: Your people had little difficulty subduing the locals — nobody had the strength to resist. Gaunt and exhausted by their miserable lot, they dolefully watched on as the invaders carried away the wealth, machines, and possessions laboriously scrounged together by generations of their ancestors. The shuttles, glutted with their society's toil, soared high above the oppressive clouds, far out of reach. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about other people's misery.

traits.locale_text: Tu gente no tuvo muchas dificultades para someter a los lugareños, pues nadie tenía {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}fuerzas{/g} para resistirse. Demacrados y exhaustos por su miserable situación, observaron con tristeza cómo los invasores se llevaban su riqueza, las máquinas y las posesiones que generaciones de sus antepasados habían reunido con tanto esfuerzo. Las lanzaderas, llenas del trabajo de su sociedad, se elevaban por encima de las opresivas nubes, lejos de su alcance. No les quedaba nada para sobrevivir, pero a quién le importa la miseria de los demás.

languages.text: Deine Leute hatten keine große Mühe, die Einheimischen zu überwältigen. Niemand hatte die Kraft, sich zu wehren. Abgemagert und erschöpft von ihrem schweren Los im Leben sahen sie traurig zu, wie die Invasoren alles wegtrugen. Den Reichtum, die Maschinen und die Besitztümer, die mehrere Generationen ihre Ahnen mühsam zusammengekratzt hatten. Vollgestopft mit den Früchten der harten Arbeit dieser Gesellschaft stiegen die Shuttles hoch über die erdrückenden Wolken auf, außer Reichweite. Es gab nichts mehr, was ihnen hätte helfen können, zu überleben. Aber wen schert schon das Leid anderer Leute?
languages.original_text: Your people had little difficulty subduing the locals — nobody had the strength to resist. Gaunt and exhausted by their miserable lot, they dolefully watched on as the invaders carried away the wealth, machines, and possessions laboriously scrounged together by generations of their ancestors. The shuttles, glutted with their society's toil, soared high above the oppressive clouds, far out of reach. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about other people's misery.

traits.locale_text: Deine Leute hatten keine große Mühe, die Einheimischen zu überwältigen. Niemand hatte die Kraft, sich zu wehren. Abgemagert und erschöpft von ihrem schweren Los im Leben sahen sie traurig zu, wie die Invasoren alles wegtrugen. Den Reichtum, die Maschinen und die Besitztümer, die mehrere Generationen ihre Ahnen mühsam zusammengekratzt hatten. Vollgestopft mit den Früchten der harten Arbeit dieser Gesellschaft stiegen die Shuttles hoch über die erdrückenden Wolken auf, außer Reichweite. Es gab nichts mehr, was ihnen hätte helfen können, zu überleben. Aber wen schert schon das Leid anderer Leute?

languages.text: Vos hommes maîtrisent sans peine les habitants, aucun d'entre eux n'ayant la force de leur résister. Décharnés et épuisés par leurs conditions de vie précaires, ils assistent impuissants à la confiscation des trésors, machines et autres effets grappillés de haute lutte par plusieurs générations de leurs ancêtres. Les navettes chargées à ras bord des fruits du labeur de leur société s'envolent au-dessus des nuages oppressants, désormais hors de portée. Privés de tout, ils se savent condamnés, mais après tout, qui se soucie du malheur des autres ?
languages.original_text: Your people had little difficulty subduing the locals — nobody had the strength to resist. Gaunt and exhausted by their miserable lot, they dolefully watched on as the invaders carried away the wealth, machines, and possessions laboriously scrounged together by generations of their ancestors. The shuttles, glutted with their society's toil, soared high above the oppressive clouds, far out of reach. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about other people's misery.

languages.text: Adamlarının yerel halkı bastırması hiç de zor olmadı... Kimsenin karşı koymaya kuvveti yoktu. Talihsiz kaderleri yüzünden güçsüz ve bitkin düşen halk, atalarının nesillerdir didine didine biriktirdiği tüm serveti, makineleri ve mal varlıklarını işgalcilerin alıp götürmesini hüzünle izledi. Bu toplumun emeğinin semeresiyle doldurulan mekikler, onlara zulmeden bulutların ötesine ve erişemeyecekleri yerlere çıktı. Geriye halkın hayatta kalmasına yardım edecek hiçbir şey kalmamıştı ama başka insanların sefaleti kimin umurunda?
languages.original_text: Your people had little difficulty subduing the locals — nobody had the strength to resist. Gaunt and exhausted by their miserable lot, they dolefully watched on as the invaders carried away the wealth, machines, and possessions laboriously scrounged together by generations of their ancestors. The shuttles, glutted with their society's toil, soared high above the oppressive clouds, far out of reach. There was nothing left to help them survive, but who cares about other people's misery.
